member.summary: Generates a random file name that is greater than the value of and lower than the value of .

member.name: M:Falsus.Providers.Sys.FileNameProvider.Load(Falsus.GeneratorProperties.DataGeneratorProperty{System.String},System.Int32)
member.summary: Instructs the data provider to prepare the data for generation based on the provided .
member.param: An implementation of the generic defining the property that this provider has been attached to.
The desired number of rows to be generated.
member.remarks: Invoked before any calculation takes place, the goal of this method is usually preparing or caching data for the generation taking place afterwards.

member.name: T:Falsus.Providers.Sys.SemanticVersionProviderConfiguration
member.summary: This class represents the configuration object of the data provider.

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Sys.SemanticVersionProviderConfiguration.IncludeAlphaStage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the "Alpha" release stage can be used to generate the semantic version.
member.value: True if the "Alpha" release stage can be used, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Sys.SemanticVersionProviderConfiguration.IncludeBetaStage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the "Beta" release stage can be used to generate the semantic version.
member.value: True if the "Beta" release stage can be used, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Sys.SemanticVersionProviderConfiguration.IncludeReleaseCandidateStage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the "Release candidate" release stage can be used to generate the semantic version.
member.value: True if the "Release candidate" release stage can be used, otherwise false.

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Sys.SemanticVersionProviderConfiguration.UseNumStatusFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the numeric status format should be used to generate the semantic relase stage component of the semantic version.
member.value: True if the numeric status format should be used, otherwise false.
member.remarks: When set to true, instead of generating semantic versions such as "X.X.X-a.X", "X.X.X-b.X" or "X.X.X-rc.X" it will generate semantic versions as follows "X.X.0.X", "X.X.1.X" or "X.X.2.X".

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Sys.SemanticVersionProviderConfiguration.MinMajorVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum inclusive value for the Major component of the version.
member.value: A nullable representing the minimum Major version.

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Sys.SemanticVersionProviderConfiguration.MaxMajorVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value for the Major component of the version.
member.value: A nullable representing the maximum Major version.

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Sys.SemanticVersionProviderConfiguration.MinMinorVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum inclusive value for the Minor component of the version.
member.value: A nullable representing the minimum Minor version.

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Sys.SemanticVersionProviderConfiguration.MaxMinorVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value for the Minor component of the version.
member.value: A nullable representing the maximum Minor version.

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Sys.SemanticVersionProviderConfiguration.MinPatchVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum inclusive value for the Patch component of the version.
member.value: A nullable representing the minimum Patch version.

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Sys.SemanticVersionProviderConfiguration.MaxPatchVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value for the Patch component of the version.
member.value: A nullable representing the maximum Patch version.

member.name: P:Falsus.Providers.Sys.SemanticVersionProviderConfiguration.MinStageVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum inclusive value for the release stage component of the version.
member.value: A nullable representing the minimum release stage version.

member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum inclusive value for the release stage component of the version.
member.value: A nullable representing the maximum release stage version.
